nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## Youtube Video Summary
Given a **video_id** from Youtube, we concatenate the data and pass it to a summarization chain. To run this workflow, you need to have the credentials for SearchApi.io and some LLM provider.

You can pass the **video_id** from previous nodes to make a better automation

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# SearchApi Youtube Video Summary

## Overview
Automated workflow: SearchApi Youtube Video Summary. This workflow integrates 9 different services: stickyNote, searchApi, textSplitterRecursiveCharacterTextSplitter, splitOut, summarize. It contains 12 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 12
- **Node Types**: 9
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When clicking ‘Test workflow’**: manualTrigger
- **Summarization Chain**: chainSummarization
- **Recursive Character Text Splitter**: textSplitterRecursiveCharacterTextSplitter
- **Split Out**: splitOut
- **Summarize**: summarize
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **SearchApi**: searchApi
- **OpenAI Chat Model**: lmChatOpenAi
- **Error Handler**: stopAndError
- ... and 2 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
